testcase.name: getTestCaseName('DIGEST-MD5 - Preamble')

sequence.message: 'Security: SASL DIGEST-MD5: Preamble Step 1 - Admin Changing Pwd Storage to CLEAR'

sequence.message: 'Security: SASL DIGEST-MD5: Preamble Step 2 - Admin Changing Password for three users'

{ 'dsInstanceHost' : DIRECTORY_INSTANCE_HOST , 'dsInstancePort' : DIRECTORY_INSTANCE_PORT , 'dsInstanceDn' : DIRECTORY_INSTANCE_DN , 'dsInstancePswd' : DIRECTORY_INSTANCE_PSWD , 'DNToModify' : 'uid=jwalleye, ou=People, o=SASL Realm Tests, dc=example,dc=com' , 'attributeName' : 'userpassword' , 'newAttributeValue' : 'frogleg' , 'changetype' : 'replace' }

{ 'dsInstanceHost' : DIRECTORY_INSTANCE_HOST , 'dsInstancePort' : DIRECTORY_INSTANCE_PORT , 'dsInstanceDn' : DIRECTORY_INSTANCE_DN , 'dsInstancePswd' : DIRECTORY_INSTANCE_PSWD , 'DNToModify' : 'uid=jcarp, ou=People, o=SASL Tests, dc=example,dc=com' , 'attributeName' : 'userpassword' , 'newAttributeValue' : 'carpleg' , 'changetype' : 'replace' }

testcase.name: getTestCaseName('DIGEST-MD5 - Postamble')

sequence.message: 'Security: SASL DIGEST-MD5: Postamble Step 1 - Admin Changing Pwd Storage to SSHA'
sequence.call: { 'dsInstanceHost' : DIRECTORY_INSTANCE_HOST , 'dsInstancePort' : DIRECTORY_INSTANCE_PORT , 'dsInstanceDn' : DIRECTORY_INSTANCE_DN , 'dsInstancePswd' : DIRECTORY_INSTANCE_PSWD , 'propertyName' : 'Default Password Policy' , 'attributeName' : 'default-password-storage-scheme' , 'attributeValue' : 'Salted SHA-1' }
sequence.message: 'Security: SASL DIGEST-MD5: Postamble Step 2 - Admin Restting Password for two users'
